publications.name: Enhancing Mental Health Disorder Detection: A Hybrid Classifier System Using Soft Voting and Ensemble Methods
publications.summary:
Early detection and diagnosis of mental health disorders based on patient-reported symptoms is vital in mental health care. This research proposes an ensemble learning pipeline for predicting mental health disorders using symptoms and demographic data. The pipeline incorporates preprocessing techniques such as standardization, one-hot encoding, and Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency transformation, and addresses class imbalance with the Synthetic Minority Over-sampling Technique to‚Ä¶
